name: Death Lightning
info:
Strike a small area around you with multiple lightning strikes which each leave behind a cloud of deadly mist for 3 seconds, causing <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Charging increases damage and number of lightning strikes.

<font color="#A17945">Death blight:</font> Instant death. Only effective against Tarnished.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 513
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (charged):</font> 564
<font color="#A17945">Base death blight accumulation:</font> 30
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Cult

name: Catch Flame
info:
Conjure a small burst of flame directly in front of you. Can be cast without delay after performing another action and on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 225
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: O, Flame!
info:
Conjure a large burst of flame directly in front of you. Charging increases damage. Can be cast without delay after performing another action and on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 257
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 301
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame Sling
info:
Lob a fireball. Charging increases damage and creates a small explosion on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 202
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 255
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
info:
Lob a barrage of fireballs over a wide area. Charging increases damage and creates small explosions on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 245
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 286
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Whirl, O Flame!
info:
Shoot a stream of fire forward in a spiral pattern. Charging increases damage and distance. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 91
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 106
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Cleanse Me
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font> and alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Grant Me Strength
info:
Increase all <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#F48C25">fire damage inflicted</font> by 20% for 30 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Flame, Protect Me
info:
Increase <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font> by 60% for 70 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Giantsflame Take Thee
info:
Lob a large fireball which explodes on impact. Charging increases damage and creates a larger explosion on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 325
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 389
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Flame of the Fell God
caption: Said to be inhabited by a fell god.
info:
Conjure a large, fiery orb which floats forward for a few seconds, or until impact, before exploding. The explosion leaves behind a fire which will burn on the ground for a few seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 352
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fire):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Burn, O Flame!
info:
Conjure a large number of flame pillars around you. Charging increases the number of flame pillars.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 288
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Giants' Flame

name: Black Flame
info:
Lob a fireball of black fire. In addition to the damage from the projectile, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases the projectile's damage and creates a small explosion on impact. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 214
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 248
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Surge, O Flame!
info:
Spew a stream of fire forward. Hold to continue casting. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 51
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Scouring Black Flame
info:
Sweep a wide area with black flame. In addition to the damage from the projectile, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases projectile damage and distance. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 255
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 299
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Black Flame Ritual
info:

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 106
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 109

name: Black Flame Blade
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 65 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> for 7 seconds. In addition to the damage from each attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast without delay after performing another action.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Black Flame's Protection
info:
Increase <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font> by 35%, but reduce all healing by 20% for 70 seconds. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin, Godslayer

name: Noble Presence
info:
Produce a shockwave of black flame which may knock back nearby foes. In addition to the damage from the shockwave, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Charging increases damage and size of the shockwave, and may toss smaller enemies into the air.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 239
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 279
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Godskin

name: Bloodflame Talons
info:
Conjure a set bloodflame lacerations in front of you, which then explodes. In addition to the damage from the attack it causes 50 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast repeatedly.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosions):</font> 236
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

Scatter an arc of bloodflame which burns on the ground for 2.5 seconds. In addition to the damage from the attack it causes 30 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 40 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> for 60 seconds. In addition to the damage from each attack it causes 20 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> per second for 2 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

info:
Increase <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> by 60% for you and nearby allies for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

name: Protection of the Erdtree
info:
Increase <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage negation</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font>, and <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> for you and nearby allies by 30% for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

info:
Increase <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 60% for you and nearby allies. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

name: Assassin's Approach
info:
Completely negate fall damage and sound made by the during movement for 30 seconds. Can be cast while in motion, while crouching, and on horseback.

The height at which a fall is fatal remains the same even while under the effects of this incantation.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

name: Shadow Bait
info:
Lob a pale shadow which lures human enemies to attack it, even if they are already in combat. Can be cast while in motion, while crouching, and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Two Fingers

Conjure a cloud of dark smoke for 3 seconds, which will cause any enemies hit by it to be unable to see you for 7 seconds. Can be cast while in motion, while crouching, and on horseback.

name: Golden Vow
info:
Increase <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 15% and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 10% for you and nearby allies for 80 seconds. Hold to delay activation. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

info:
Shoot a small ring of light which goes forward then returns to you. Can be cast repeatedly and 2 rings can exist at a time. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 114

name: Triple Rings of Light

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectiles):</font> 20

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Law of Regression
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>, and <font color="#C18B8B">acid debuff</font>. Alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font>, <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font>. Remove all active special effects, such as buffs or debuffs from spells, from everyone nearby, including your own. Reveal mimicry of any form. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Immutable Shield
info:
Enchant left-hand armament. Makes you completely immune to <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>, <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>, <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font>, <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font> from blocked attacks for 30 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Litany of Proper Death
info:
Shoot an arc of light along the ground in front of you. Inflicts 900% more damage to Those Who Live in Death.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 56
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Law of Causality
info:
Conjure a small ring of light on you which will explode after receiving 5 attacks. This does not include damage from status effects, damage over time effects, self-inflicted damage, or attacks where 100% of the damage was blocked using a shield. The resulting explosion doesn't harm yourself. The ring will disappear after 120 seconds if the explosion is not triggered. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 487
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order

name: Order's Blade
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 75% of casting armament's incant scaling value as <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> for 90 seconds. Inflicts 100% more damage to Those Who Live in Death.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (charged):</font> 379

<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 110

info:

name: Ekzykes's Decay
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes a rotten mist which inflicts <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 33, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 155
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation:</font> 65
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Glintstone Breath
info:
Conjure a dragon head that breathes magical flames, which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 159
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes magical flames, which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 188
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Placidusax's Ruin
info:
Cause an explosion of red lightning around you then jump up and conjure a dragon head which shoots a golden beam in a wide arc in front of you. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (beam):</font> 356
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 241
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> None

Conjure a dragon claw and slam in to the ground to cause a shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which is slightly stronger.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (claw):</font> 395, 410
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (shockwave):</font> 253, 263
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

Conjure a dragon head which will bite in front of you.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 628
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Greyoll's Roar
info:
Conjure a dragon head which lets out a loud roar. Reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 15% and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 10% for all nearby enemies for 60 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion

name: Pest Threads
info:
Shoot a large number of projectiles in an arc above you, which then fly toward the target.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Swarm of Flies
info:
Conjure a swarm of bloodflies which attack the target 6 times with alternating damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 52, 15, 52, 15, 52, 15
<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 0, 70, 0, 70, 0, 70
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath

name: Poison Mist
info:
Conjure a cloud of poison mist which lasts for 15 seconds and causes <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.07% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 7, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation:</font> 20
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Poison Armament
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Causes 70 <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> per attack for 60 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.07% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 7, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Scarlet Aeonia
info:
Incarnate a giant flower that blooms into an explosion of scarlet rot mist which lingers for 4 seconds.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 13, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (explosion):</font> 362
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (mist):</font> 60
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (explosion):</font> 150
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (mist):</font> 50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot

name: Inescapable Frenzy
info:
Grab a Tarnished and emit a yellow flame of frenzy directly into their eyes 6 times. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself for the initial cast and each of the 6 hits. This is only effective against Tarnished and cannot be used on any other enemies.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 70
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: The Flame of Frenzy
caption: The flame of frenzy deals damage and causes accumulation of madness. This incantation also causes accumulation of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.
info:
Sporadically shoot several yellow flame of frenzy streams. Charging increases damage and distance. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 107
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 124
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 25
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (charged):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Unendurable Frenzy
info:
Sporadically shoot several yellow flame of frenzy streams forward, then several more in every direction. Hold to continue casting. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 125
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 25
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Frenzied Burst
info:
Shoot a blast of yellow flame of frenzy. Charging increases damage and allows projectile to penetrate enemy's guard. Causes 20 <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself, 30 if charged. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 250
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 309
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 90
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (charged):</font> 105
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Howl of Shabriri
info:
Release a maddening shriek which produces a yellow flame of frenzy wave around you, hitting enemies several times. Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 25% but reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 30% for yourself for 40 seconds. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 22
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Tail
info:
Conjure a large tail a swing it in a horizontal arc in front of you. Hold to do a second, stronger swing.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 202, 274
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
info:
Conjure a horn on your shoulder and ram it forward. Charging increases damage and cuases you to charge forward.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 277
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (charged):</font> 327
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath
info:
Walk forward while spewing a wide arc of flames. Hold to continue casting for a few more steps.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 98
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible

name: Black Blade
info:
Conjure an illusory greatsword and swing it vertically in front of you, which shoots out a projectile. Allows one follow-up cast, which is a slightly stronger horizontal swing. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds and have their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> reduced by 10% for 15 seconds.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (greatsword):</font> 225, 232
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 162, 169
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree

name: Fire's Deadly Sin
info:
Create an explosion of flame around you, igniting yourself on fire for 40 seconds. You will take 3 damage per second during this time. Charging increases damage but also increase damage per second you take to 4.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 183
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fire):</font> 45
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, explosion):</font> 212
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, fire):</font> 59
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk

name: Golden Lightning Fortification
info:
Increase <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 60% for yourself and nearby allies for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree
